statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sales_id = 100;
SELECT sales_date, quantity_sold FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 50;
SELECT product_id, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS average_price FROM SalesData;
SELECT sales_id, sales_date, product_id, quantity_sold, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold, AVG(unit_price) AS average_price FROM SalesData GROUP BY sales_id, product_id HAVING total_sold > 500;
SELECT sales_date, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products_sold FROM SalesData GROUP BY sales_date HAVING unique_products_sold >= 5;
SELECT sales_id, sales_date, quantity_sold * unit_price AS total_revenue FROM SalesData WHERE unit_price >= 50 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, quantity_sold, unit_price, quantity_sold * unit_price AS total_price FROM SalesData WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM product_details ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_details WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_details WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_details INNER JOIN sales_data ON product_details.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 101
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price, revenue FROM product_details LEFT JOIN sales_data ON product_details.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE revenue > 500
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM historical_sales_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT order_id, product_name, SUM(quantity * unit_price) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_quantity, confidence_level FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 500 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM historical_sales_data WHERE unit_price >= 50.00 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast WHERE confidence_level >= 80.00 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_quantity, forecast_date FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecast_quantity FROM products JOIN sales_forecast ON products.product_id = sales_forecast.product_id WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles')
SELECT forecast_id, forecasted_demand FROM forecasts ORDER BY forecasted_date ASC
SELECT sales_date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount < 1000
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, address, city FROM customers WHERE city='New York'
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT forecasted_date, forecasted_demand FROM forecasts ORDER BY forecasted_date ASC
